schwaebische.de.113476.1: Biker reacts lightning fast and prevents worse
schwaebische.de.113476.2: On Friday evening, a traffic accident occurred on the highway between Machtolsheim and Merklingen, in which a motorcyclist was only slightly injured thanks to his quick reaction.
schwaebische.de.113476.4: A 44-year-old driver wanted to turn left with her VW coming from Merklingen on the state road 1230 in the direction of Machtolsheim.
schwaebische.de.113476.5: Here she overlooked the 24-year-old motorcyclist coming from the direction of Nellingen.
schwaebische.de.113476.6: In the event of a collision, handbrake and foot brake levers fly away
schwaebische.de.113476.7: The biker still tried to avoid the car, but nevertheless touched it at the rear of the vehicle.
schwaebische.de.113476.8: The Suzuki's hand and foot brake levers were torn off and the driver was no longer able to brake.
schwaebische.de.113476.9: He steered his motorcycle in the green stiffeners next to the road and let it roll out there without falling.
schwaebische.de.113476.11: Due to the collision with the car, the biker still suffered an injury at the Beim and had to be treated in a clinic.
np-coburg.de.105627.1: Mamming: Mass Corona Infection: 174 Harvesters Infected
np-coburg.de.105627.2: After a mass corona infection on a large vegetable farm in Mamming, Lower Bavaria, almost 500 people are under quarantine and are no longer allowed to leave the company.
np-coburg.de.105627.3: A security service supervises the curfew.
np-coburg.de.105627.4: A total of 174 harvesters were tested positive for the corona pathogen SARS-CoV-2 during the screening, as the district office of Dingolfing-Landau announced on Saturday evening.
np-coburg.de.105627.5: "Unfortunately, in order to prevent further spread, we have to take this step to protect the population," explained District Administrator Werner Bumeder (CSU).
np-coburg.de.105627.6: Previously, seven employees had already been infected in the company - this was the reason for the series test.
np-coburg.de.105627.7: The farm is a large vegetable farm that grows strawberries, cucumbers, cabbage and beetroot - the cucumbers, however, only for jars.
np-coburg.de.105627.8: Mamming is a rural community with a good 3300 inhabitants not far from Dingolfing with its large BMW plant.
np-coburg.de.105627.9: Bumeder appealed to the citizens to keep calm: "According to our information, it is a closed circle of people".
np-coburg.de.105627.10: On the farm, infected workers were separated from uninfected workers, the site is now surrounded by a fence.
np-coburg.de.105627.11: The Greens and the SPD shared responsibility with the state government.
np-coburg.de.105627.12: The two opposition factions accused Prime Minister Markus Soeder (CSU) and his cabinet of neglecting the control of the accommodation of seasonal workers.
np-coburg.de.105627.13: "This can take bitter revenge if such local infections spread and regional lockdowns have to be ordered," said Juergen Mistol, the parliamentary managing director of the Greens.
np-coburg.de.105627.14: The SPD takes a very similar view: "After the corona outbreak in the Wiesenhof slaughterhouse in mid-May, we have already called for a special control program for farms with harvest workers," said environmental expert Florian von Brunn.
np-coburg.de.105627.15: "From our point of view, the hygiene conditions at the workplace and the living conditions in particular must be closely monitored.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.1: Subway station Aidenbachstrasse: Dangerous dispute: 19-year-old falls into the track bed after Schubser
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.2: In a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstrasse underground station, a 19-year-old fell through a shove and slipped into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.3: Obersendling - On Friday there was a dispute between two youth groups at the underground station Aidenbachstrasse at 4.15 pm.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.4: A passer-by alerted the police, who approached with several patrols.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.5: According to initial investigations, a Munich resident (17) pushed a 19-year-old to the ground.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.6: The young man slipped over the platform edge and fell into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.7: People from the group of the 17-year-old helped the fallen person to climb off the track.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.8: There was no danger of an approaching railway.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.9: According to the police, there were again clashes between the two people.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.10: The 17-year-old initially fled the scene of the crime, but his personal details could be determined afterwards.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.11: Accompanied by his father, he went to the Police Inspectorate 29.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.12: The 17-year-old is under investigation for assault.
landeszeitung.de.13223.1: Report: Seehofer pushes for longer data retention
landeszeitung.de.13223.3: According to a media report, however, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer calls for an extension of the storage period.
landeszeitung.de.13223.4: He wants to strengthen the fight against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.5: According to a media report, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer (CSU) is calling for an extension of data retention - instead of the planned ten weeks for half a year.
landeszeitung.de.13223.6: As the "Bild am Sonntag" reports, Seehofer asked Minister of Justice Christine Lambrecht (SPD) in a letter for a quick change in the law.
landeszeitung.de.13223.7: Seehofer therefore wants to strengthen the measures against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.8: He believes it makes sense "to make urgently needed adjustments to the law now," the newspaper quotes from the letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.10: A decision of the European Court of Justice is expected.
landeszeitung.de.13223.11: Seehofer, however, wants the amendments in advance so that they can be applied immediately after a possible positive verdict, the report continues.
landeszeitung.de.13223.12: A spokesman for the Ministry of Justice told the newspaper that it could only be meaningfully examined whether legal adjustments were needed once the courts had ruled.
landeszeitung.de.13223.13: In the fight against child abuse and child pornography, Seehofer, together with the interior ministers of the federal states, had already spoken out in June in favour of data retention.
bild.255016.1: NBA: Stripclub Trouble for Clippers Star Lou Williams
bild.255016.3: Lou Williams (33), basketball pro of the Los Angeles Clippers, is said to have left the tournament quarters in Disney World in Orlando / Florida with permission for a funeral.
bild.255016.4: According to US media reports, he still visited the strip club "Magic City" in Atlanta in the evening.
bild.255016.5: Williams, who is said to have admitted the visit according to ESPN data, is back in isloation, is tested daily on COVID-19.
bild.255016.6: His reason to visit: Chicken Wings.
bild.255016.7: In February last year, "Sweet Lou", as he is called in the NBA, already expressed his love for exactly these wings.
bild.255016.8: The American wrote: "Magic City and Blue Flame (another strip club in Atlanta) have the best wings in town".
bild.255016.9: NBA insider Shams Charania announced on Sunday on Twitter that the NBA has imposed a ten-day quarantine on Williams.
bild.255016.10: Thus, the Clippers star missed the first two official games after the test phase.
bild.255016.11: In Disney World, the NBA wants to end the Corona season.
bild.255016.12: Currently, the best 22 teams are preparing for the season finale, which starts on Friday night.
np-coburg.de.105625.1: Soeder expresses itself after mass infection to the corona-situation
np-coburg.de.105625.2: Munich - Health Minister Melanie Huml (CSU) has already announced a test offensive for large farms on Sunday.
np-coburg.de.105625.3: The press conference will be shown live on our homepage.
np-coburg.de.105625.4: The case in Mamming in the district of Dingolfing-Landau has alarmed the authorities and politicians.
np-coburg.de.105625.5: Almost 500 harvesters from several countries are currently working on the large vegetable farm, and more than a third have been infected with the corona pathogen.
np-coburg.de.105625.6: The farm is now under quarantine and is fenced off with a construction fence.
np-coburg.de.105625.7: No one is allowed to leave the premises, food is delivered.
np-coburg.de.105625.8: The authorities are now offering free corona tests to the 3,300 inhabitants of the municipality.
np-coburg.de.105625.9: Since the harvesters had little contact with the local population, the district office has so far assumed that the infections have not spread beyond the farm.
kurier.at.204625.1: "Remorse": Confession of the alleged arsonist of Nantes
kurier.at.204625.2: "My client has been cooperative," lawyer Quentin Chabert told the newspaper.
kurier.at.204625.3: The defence lawyer added: "He deeply regrets the deeds, the confession was a liberation for him".
kurier.at.204625.4: His mandate was "plagued by remorse and greatly affected by the extent of the destruction."
kurier.at.204625.5: In the event of a conviction, the man is threatened with ten years imprisonment and a fine of 150,000 euros, according to the public prosecutor.
kurier.at.204625.6: The Gothic St. Peter and Paul Cathedral in Nantes was severely damaged in a fire last night on Saturday.
kurier.at.204625.7: The fire had broken out in three distant places in the church.
kurier.at.204625.8: Laboratory tests confirmed the suspicion of arson.
kurier.at.204625.9: The suspect had already been arrested a few hours after the fire.
kurier.at.204625.10: However, he was released after one day.
kurier.at.204625.11: The man works as a volunteer for the diocese of Nantes and was responsible for the closure of the cathedral on the eve of the fire.
kurier.at.204625.12: Since there was no trace of a violent intrusion into the church, he quickly came into the focus of the investigators.
infranken.de.309597.1: Discussing the abolition of the 50 + 1 rule
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB President Reinhard Grindel has recommended that consideration be given to abolishing the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: "German football should at least discuss setting conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates a fait accompli," Grindel told Bild am Sonntag.
infranken.de.309597.4: He stressed: "For the clubs that are most likely to become dangerous in Bavaria and Dortmund, the 50 + 1 rules do not work anyway: See Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, there is no getting around the debate as to whether it is not advisable to facilitate the involvement of investors in associations that want to break into this phalanx ".
infranken.de.309597.6: However, he has doubts whether there is a willingness in the German Football League to allow majority participation, which is prohibited in the Bundesliga by the 50 + 1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.7: "It remains a legal risk to build investment fences around the Bundesliga as a business location in a single European market," said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former DFB boss sees the danger that "the attempts to ensure more competitive balance in the Bundesliga will ultimately only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but will not lead to more tension in the championship."
infranken.de.309597.9: Even an equal distribution of TV funds will not have a decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: "FC Bayern generates a turnover of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund 500 million and RB Leipzig 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: So the differences between the first three clubs are already immense.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million, "the 58-year-old explained.
infranken.de.309597.13: Looking back at the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: "Unfortunately, there have been people who have noticed this mistake and pierced the press instead of addressing me," Grindel said about the adoption of an expensive watch that led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: "That has already occupied me a lot in human terms."
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift worth around 11,000 euros from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: "I committed a compliance violation, and it was right to draw the consequences," Grindel said.
infranken.de.309597.18: "I handled the ominous watch gift completely transparently and without suspicion.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many people in the DFB knew about it. "
infranken.de.309597.20: He had never "made a secret of the present," the 58-year-old assured.
infranken.de.309597.21: "This may be called naive, but this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption."
faz.79601.1: "Black Lives Matter": Injured and one dead
faz.79601.2: Protests against police violence in the United States have escalated again with Donald Trump's deployment of federal police in several cities.
faz.79601.3: On Saturday there were clashes between protesters and police in various cities.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville and 16 people were arrested in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, one person was killed by gunfire while a march was crossing an intersection.
faz.79601.6: Previously, there had been clashes in Portland during protests against racism and police violence.
faz.79601.7: The security forces, including federal police officers, used tear gas on Saturday night and violently dispersed demonstrators.
faz.79601.8: Hundreds of partially armed protesters marched through Louisville, Kentucky on Saturday, demanding that those responsible for Breonna Taylor's death be held accountable.
faz.79601.9: The 26-year-old student had been shot dead in March during a drug raid in her apartment in Louisville.
faz.79601.10: The target of the raid was someone else who did not live there, and no drugs were found.
faz.79601.11: When a member of a group calling itself the Armed Alliance of Black Americans fired a shot on Saturday, three people were injured.
faz.79601.12: According to NBC, they were taken to the hospital.
faz.79601.13: None of them were in mortal danger.
faz.79601.14: The police set up barricades because counter-demonstrators of a white militia had also formed.
faz.79601.15: In the end, the two groups did not meet.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, one person was shot and killed in a "Black Lives Matter" demonstration.
faz.79601.17: The police claimed to have taken a suspect into custody.
faz.79601.18: She has not yet provided any further information on the circumstances of the crime.
faz.79601.19: Mayor Steve Adler, according to the New York Times, said he, like many in the city, was "inconsolable and stunned" by what had happened.
faz.79601.20: Demonstrators also clashed with the police in the American metropolis of Seattle on Saturday.
faz.79601.21: They set fire to construction vehicles in front of a youth prison, and the police used blinding grenades and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: According to the Seattle Times, 16 people were arrested for resisting police or assault.
faz.79601.23: In the city of Oakland, California, a courthouse was set on fire.
faz.79601.24: A small group of protesters smashed windows, fired fireworks, and blinded police officers with lasers, Oakland police said late Saturday night (local time).
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver, Colorado, a car drove through a crowd demonstrating on a highway.
faz.79601.27: According to the police, one of the demonstrators fired a gun and at least one person was taken to the hospital injured.
faz.79601.28: In addition, windows were smashed in a court and a fire was set, the police reported.
infranken.de.309607.1: Rakoczy in Bad Kissingen: Historical costumes defy Corona
infranken.de.309607.2: Although the big party was missing in the spa town, visitors and performers enjoyed the Rakoczy flair of the alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.3: It was unusual for visitors, performers and organizers: The Rakoczy weekend without Rakoczy festival.
infranken.de.309607.4: But: Even if the big party mile in the city center was missing, the crowds and program highlights such as Saale burn, Rakoczy ball or pageant, many came at the Corona compliant alternative program at their expense.
infranken.de.309607.5: "I think we have succeeded in spreading Rakoczy flair," says spa director Sylvie Thormann.
infranken.de.309607.6: The guests would have accepted it well.
infranken.de.309607.7: In principle, one returns to the beginnings of the Rakoczy festival, as well as the historical ones alone were in the focus of the festival.
infranken.de.309607.9: For more than 25 years, Vesna Konhaeuser and her husband have always visited Bad Kissingen for the Rakoczy festival.
infranken.de.309607.10: This time, too, in the Corona year.
infranken.de.309607.11: The couple has made themselves comfortable at the Luitpold Casino, watching the historical ones while strolling and listening to the Cuban live music at the casino restaurant.
infranken.de.309607.12: "I also find it quite pleasant," says Konhaeuser.
infranken.de.309607.13: She does not miss the crowds that otherwise belong to Rakoczy.
infranken.de.309607.14: But it lacks the usual program highlights, above all Saale burns on Friday evening as well as the historical parade and the closing fireworks on Sunday evening.
infranken.de.309607.16: The weather would have been great this year, "she says.
infranken.de.309607.17: Rakoczy-Equestrian Tournament to take place again
infranken.de.309607.18: For the performers of the historical spa guests, the alternative program sometimes meant more work.
infranken.de.309607.19: For example, for Christina Gold, who takes part in the parade in a normal year and can be seen there on the carriage of the Kurgarten cafeteria.
infranken.de.309607.20: This year she was walking around the city in costume on Saturdays and Sundays.
infranken.de.309607.21: "It's more strenuous, otherwise we'll have it easier," she says.
infranken.de.309607.22: The riding club had less to do, even if individual riders were traveling in the park.
infranken.de.309607.23: "We very much hope that the equestrian quadrille can take place again next year," says Chairman Ulrike Waldhofen.
infranken.de.309607.24: She announced that after a break of several years, a Rakoczy equestrian tournament will take place again in 2021.
morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 Corona cases in Spanish second-division club Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: The Spanish second division football club CF Fuenlabrada is sliding deeper and deeper into the crisis because of a corona outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: Since the newcomer from near Madrid had flown to a game in the city of A Coru on July 20, despite the first corona cases, one low blow follows the next.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday, 28 players or team members had been tested positive, one came to the hospital, the club announced.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Fuenlabrada from the city of the same name southwest of Madrid still had the chance to reach the promotion playoffs.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now even the relegation to the B-group of the Second League threatens.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: The match against Deportivo La Coru a last Monday was cancelled at the last minute, the prosecutor's office is investigating a possible offense against public health, the supreme sports authority CSD is considering the forced relegation of the club.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: Players and other team members are quarantined in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: "Until the sixth day of quarantine, they did not receive a fresh towel and gel," wrote the sports newspaper "AS".
morgenpost.de.276358.10: Photos show how players hung up underwear and club clothes in their rooms in the hotel to dry after they apparently had to wash them themselves.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: The bed linen had not been changed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: It is neither good nor sufficient, wrote "AS".
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club management, on the other hand, said that they were satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The club's lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas, rejected the accusation of deliberately endangering public health.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: The son of the President of the Spanish Primera Division, Javier Tebas, stressed that the corona rules established by the Football Association had not been violated, as reported by the news agency Europa Press and the sports newspaper "Marca".
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before the flight, there had been four infected persons until 19 July, but they were all isolated and had not travelled with them.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: All players and team members were tested again just before the flight on Monday to A Coruarmaca.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: When the team was already in A Corona, the corona test was positive for "five or six" other team members.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The match was cancelled 60 minutes before the kick-off, said Tebas Llanas.
mainpost.de.409271.1: Police must capture horses torn out of steam compartment
mainpost.de.409271.2: Two animals were on the road.
mainpost.de.409271.3: The police escorted her back to her owner.
mainpost.de.409271.4: On Sunday morning shortly before 6 o'clock a road user informed two free-running horses on the feeder between the junction Donnersdorf / Steinsfeld and the motorway junction Theres.
mainpost.de.409271.5: When the officers arrived, the horses were already back between the feeder and the village of Dampfach.
mainpost.de.409271.6: After the officers had won the trust of the horses shortly before Dampfach, they each had a rope carried in the patrol car.
azonline.de.86610.1: Professional cyclist Tony Martin: Career continuation conceivable
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is thinking about a continuation of his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt / Main - The seven-time time trial world champion Tony Martin can certainly imagine continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: "Together with the team, I am currently defining the framework conditions for how and in what form things could continue," the 35-year-old told the Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung.
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by the Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and had considered ending his career after this year before the Corona break.
azonline.de.86610.6: The negotiations with his team are also about the number of race days, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Or about other problems that would plague him as a family man, Martin said.
azonline.de.86610.8: He used to get up after a fall, and the first thought was: "Quickly back on the bike.
azonline.de.86610.9: Today, as the father of a little daughter, I think: What if ".
azonline.de.86610.10: The professional cyclist admitted that there are aspects with which he is increasingly struggling.
azonline.de.86610.11: "But it was good for me to remember from the Corona period what I enjoy about cycling and how much I enjoy it."
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist returns to the competition at the Tour de l'Ain (5 to 9 August).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four dead on Bavaria's streets at the weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The beautiful weather attracts bikers to the streets in many places.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, the tour by motorcycle ends fatally.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.5: Schoenthal - Several, mostly young people, died in accidents on Bavaria's streets at the weekend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.6: An 18-year-old motorcyclist was caught on Saturday near Schoenthal (district of Cham) by a car that hit the opposite lane.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: At first it was unclear why the car was heading in the opposite direction.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: In Upper Bavaria, a 22-year-old collided with a horse-drawn carriage on his machine on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to the police, he was on his way downhill at Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: In a left turn, he crashed into the carriage.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve occupants of the carriage, one man was seriously and one man slightly injured, the police reported.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: In another fatal accident, an 18-year-old died in Bad Koetzting, Upper Palatinate.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: He had laid down on a street during the night of Sunday and was overrun by a 42-year-old motorist.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: According to the police, the 18-year-old wanted to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The driver could no longer brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: At Schoenberg (district of Freyung-Grafenau) a 57 year old biker collided head-on with a car in a right-hand bend despite full braking on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.18: He died at the scene of the accident.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57-year-old driver suffered a shock, the other three people in the car remained uninjured.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.20: The safety of motorcyclists was discussed on Saturday by Bavaria's Transport Minister Kerstin Schreyer (CSU).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to the organizer of the biker protests against driving bans announced for August, Gabor Kovacs, the minister referred to extensive investments such as underrun protection on crash barriers and the mitigation of dangerous curves.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.22: "We have achieved a lot for the safety of motorcyclists in recent years," the letter said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: "The number of motorized two-wheelers killed was reduced by around 28 percent compared to 2011."
freiepresse.de.254098.1: Kovac tests with Monaco against Frankfurt
freiepresse.de.254098.2: Frankfurt / Main (dpa) - Football coach Niko Kovac will soon be seeing Eintracht Frankfurt again with his new club AS Monaco.
freiepresse.de.254098.3: The eight-time French champion will make a guest appearance on 1 August (6 p.m.) at the Hesse, the former club of the Croatian.
freiepresse.de.254098.4: For the Bundesliga club, it is the first and only endurance test before the return match in the Europa League against FC Basel (6 August).
freiepresse.de.254098.5: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, the match is played without spectators.
freiepresse.de.254098.6: "We are particularly looking forward to this game.
freiepresse.de.254098.7: It's always nice to come to Frankfurt and meet friends, "Kovac explained.
freiepresse.de.254098.8: From a sporting point of view, this is an interesting test, said the 48-year-old.
freiepresse.de.254098.9: Before joining FC Bayern Munich, Kovac had coached the Hessians from 2016 to 2018 and led them to victory in the DFB-Pokal.
freiepresse.de.254098.10: "A top-class opponent like Monaco is a good test for us in view of the match against Basel.
freiepresse.de.254098.11: Like all Frankfurters, I am looking forward to seeing Niko Kovac again, "said Eintracht coach Adi Huetter.
freiepresse.de.254098.12: The 50-year-old Austrian had succeeded the Croat at Eintracht.
freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, the Frankfurters had lost the first leg of the round of 16 against Basel in their own stadium with 0: 3.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.1: Nearly 50 new infections: Hof district just past the lockdown
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.2: In the county of Hof, the number of known new corona infections on the weekend has increased further: From 39 on Friday and 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and no longer falls into this statistic) to 47 on Sunday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.3: In addition, there is a case in the municipality of Hof.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.4: This means that the Hof area is approaching the critical threshold of 50 new infections per 100,000 inhabitants in one week.
euronews-de.199228.1: 700 deaths due to monsoon rains in Southeast Asia
euronews-de.199228.2: More than 9 million people are affected by the severe floods in Southeast Asia, especially in Bangladesh, India and Nepal.
euronews-de.199228.3: A total of 700 people lost their lives because of the heavy monsoon rains.
euronews-de.199228.4: In Bangladesh, the Red Crescent is trying to reach the isolated people in boats.
euronews-de.199228.6: The farmers have lost their crops.
euronews-de.199228.7: Armored rhinoceroses in national park die from landslides
euronews-de.199228.8: In Kaziranga National Park, several of the 120 rhinoceroses died from landslides.
euronews-de.199228.9: They are under protection and considered threatened with extinction.
euronews-de.199228.10: This year, the floods are particularly severe, which scientists attribute to climate change.
euronews-de.199228.11: According to the United Nations, Bangladesh is one of the countries most affected by global warming.
euronews-de.199228.13: In the town of Cox's Bazaar in southern Bangladesh, the state has built apartments for 650 people displaced by the floods.
euronews-de.199228.14: So far, only a few people have moved in.
euronews-de.199228.15: It is difficult to bring people to Cox's Bazaar.
euronews-de.199228.16: The enthusiasm also persists in Grenezn.
euronews-de.199228.17: Anyone who used to have a house, no matter how small and resembling a hut, often does not want to spend his life in a large apartment block.
euronews-de.199228.18: Many apartments are empty, but - as the government wants - they will soon be occupied by those who have lost their homes to the floods.

handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The new demands could not be met, the Ministry of Economy announced in Buenos Aires on Saturday.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: "That would not only be irresponsible, but also unjust," a statement said.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: "While 50 percent of children in Argentina live in poverty, we cannot increase the short-term profits of our creditors".
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debt of the second largest economy in South America is no longer sustainable under current conditions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: Argentina is therefore demanding that its private creditors relinquish part of their claims of around 66 billion US dollars (around 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: If no agreement is reached, the country is once again threatened with bankruptcy.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: It would be the ninth default in Argentine history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Most recently, lenders had called for higher interest rates on government bonds and changes to some contractual clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: However, the Argentine government is sticking to its last offer and is not prepared to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is experiencing a severe financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The most recent inflation rate was more than 50 percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: For the current year, experts anticipate a decline in economic power of around ten percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: At the end of May, Argentina had not paid interest receivables amounting to 503 million US dollars and had thus slipped into a limited default.
pnp.de.390078.2: "Things are going very well" - this is the conclusion of Dr. Stefanie Kramer after her first days in the notary's office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end, everything went very quickly: In mid-May, Dr. Stefanie Kramer learned that she would succeed Lutz Feller at the Eggenfeld notary's office.
pnp.de.390078.4: Just six weeks later, at the beginning of July, the doctor of law started work, and normal day-to-day business has long been running at full speed.
pnp.de.390078.5: "Privately, however, I still have to arrive," she explains in conversation with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: Of course, the short lead time was not enough to completely relocate the center of life from Regensburg to Eggenfelden, reports the native of Dingolfing.
pnp.de.390078.7: She is currently looking for a suitable apartment or house in the city with her husband, who works as a judge at the Regional Court in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband could still apply for parental leave at short notice in order to be able to guarantee the care of the two daughters (3 extended and 1 extended years old).
pnp.de.390078.9: In order not to have to commute every day from Regensburg, she also has an overnight stay with her parents in Dingolfing for the time being, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.10: Having grown up in the neighbouring district, she has of course long been familiar with the city of Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.11: During visits with her family over the past few months, she once again stated: "Eggenfelden is a really beautiful small town".
pnp.de.390078.12: She was all the more pleased that she had won the selection process for the vacancy.
pnp.de.390078.13: Her homeland of Lower Bavaria also plays a central role in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's professional career: After studying law in Passau, she completed her legal clerkship and the 2nd state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several positions as a notary assessor, including in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in Lower Allgaeu and Regensburg - during this time she also "incidentally" shouldered the doctorate in employment law - she took up her first position as a notary in Rotthalmuenster in the district of Passau in 2012.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016 she went on parental leave and finally moved to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then, she has taken over representation services in various notarial offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the position in Eggenfelden was advertised due to the approaching retirement of Lutz Feller, she saw the right time for the full return to work, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.18: The team of her predecessor, who will take over the holiday representation in the notarial office in the future, has taken over Dr. Stefanie Kramer completely - and immediately has a praise for the team of the law firm ready: "It is going super well!"
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on well-rehearsed processes here makes it easier for her to take care of the upcoming relocation of the private center of life.
pnp.de.390078.20: In terms of kindergarten and nursery places, she has already contacted a local institution.
pnp.de.390078.21: And if everything works out as desired, she hopes to be able to pursue her hobby here soon - and to get to know the most beautiful jogging routes in the Rottal.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans to start the league with maximum 15,000 spectators
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund The largest German football stadium in Dortmund will not even be filled to 20 percent at the start of the season in the event of a fan return.
an-online.de.487062.3: "Due to the distance regulation, which must be complied with, we are currently planning with 12,000 to 15,000 spectators," Borussia Dortmund's Managing Director Carsten Cramer told the Tagesspiegel.
an-online.de.487062.4: Normally, the arena in the district city holds a little more than 81,000 spectators at Bundesliga matches.
an-online.de.487062.5: In the ghost games caused by the corona pandemic last season, BVB lost about four million euros per game.
an-online.de.487062.6: Cramer, who is responsible for marketing, digitalization and internationalization at BVB, hopes that in addition to the normal spectator seats, some of the approximately 4000 seats in the hospitality sector can be opened again: "It is of course a blow to the office if these revenues completely break down".
an-online.de.487062.7: In view of the ongoing corona crisis, everyone is currently "well advised to take a stable sideline".
an-online.de.487062.8: "If many companies are not doing well and 6.8 million people in Germany alone are in short-time work, then the need for entertainment is limited," Cramer explained.
an-online.de.487062.9: The Dortmund marketing manager praised the BVB professionals for their partial salary waiver, which should help to overcome the crisis: "Of course, the players know that their salary waiver has a different effect than if we put 100 people who work in merchandising on short-time work".
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: Early start to life with a few hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Hardly heavier than a packet of butter, just three tablespoons of blood in his entire body: That was Gabriel when he was born - he weighed exactly 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The boy is one of about 400 premature babies who are cared for annually at the Graz Children's Hospital.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1,500 grams, a few - like Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael - are extreme lightweights with less than a kilogram of birth weight.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are born so small and so early that neither lungs, nor intestines, nor muscles are fully developed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Their skin is sometimes so tender that they could hurt the electrodes of an ECG.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they are so tiny that they sometimes wear doll clothes and mini diapers made especially for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they wouldn't have a voice - "and how," smiles Berndt Urlesberger.
kurier.at.204565.9: "Even if, of course, they don't scream quite as loudly as big babies."
schwaebische-post.de.62177.1: When the whiteboard becomes a stage
schwaebische-post.de.62177.2: Despite Corona Theater in the classroom: The whiteboard as a stage experienced the 9th grades of the St. James Gymnasium in Abtsgmuend shortly before the start of the holiday.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.3: Actress Julia Sylvester from the Theater der Stadt Aalen presented the production "Das Heimatkleid" to the students - via video.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.4: Afterwards, the students were able to exchange information about the play and the performance with the actress and the director Winfried Tobias via Skype.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.5: The idea for the performance format was born from the current corona situation.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teacher Teresa Nar was happy about the enrichment of the lessons.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even if in the end all participants agreed that the direct encounter in the theatre and stage space would offer additional stimuli, one can also see the potential for contact in the schools in the theatre.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: "If we continue to improve the technical framework, this could be an interesting addition to the game," emphasised director Winfried Tobias.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.1: First round draw: TSV 1860 would face Eintracht Frankfurt in the DFB-Pokal
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.2: Should TSV 1860 qualify for the DFB-Pokal, the lions will face Eintracht Frankfurt in the first round.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.3: This resulted in the draw on Sunday.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.4: Munich - Sixty possible opponents in the first round of the DFB-Pokal have been decided.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.5: The lions would face Eintracht Frankfurt in a successful qualification.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.6: This was the result of the draw on Sunday evening in the ARD sports show.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.7: Because the field of participants is not yet complete due to the corona pandemic, placeholders were used in the draw.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.8: Due to the voluntary waiver of semi-final opponents FC Memmingen, TSV 1860 is already in the final of the Bavarian Toto-Pokal (4 or 5 September).
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.9: There the lions meet either the Wuerzburger Kickers or Viktoria Aschaffenburg.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.10: If they reached the final, they would qualify for the first round of the DFB-Pokal.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.11: Otherwise, the Giesinger would have to prevail in the final against Regionalliga Aschaffenburg.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.12: The first round of the DFB-Pokal will take place between 11 and 14 September, one week before the start of the third division.
mz-web.de.376296.1: "Gone with the Wind": Film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead
mz-web.de.376296.2: Film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.
mz-web.de.376296.3: She died of natural causes on Sunday in Paris at the age of 104, confirmed her spokesperson for the German Press Agency.
mz-web.de.376296.4: De Havilland was known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the Southern epic "Gone with the Wind" (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born to British parents in Tokyo, Olivia de Havilland moved to California as a toddler.
mz-web.de.376296.6: The Austrian theater man Max Reinhardt discovered the 19-year-old in the role of Hermia von Shakespeare's "Midsummer Night's Dream".
mz-web.de.376296.7: The film studio Warner Brothers signed her for seven years and released her alongside Eroll Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She made eight films with the heartbreaker.
mz-web.de.376296.9: In 1946 she won her first Oscar in the leading role of "To Each His Own".
mz-web.de.376296.10: The film was shown in Germany under the title "Mutterherz".
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later came the award for Best Actress in William Wyler's "The Heiress".
mz-web.de.376296.12: She also received a lot of recognition as a neurotic eccentric in "The Dark Mirror" and "The Snake Pit".
mz-web.de.376296.13: Daphne du Maurier suggested her for the leading role in the 1952 film adaptation of her novel "My Cousin Rachel".
mz-web.de.376296.14: The play became a worldwide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: With her longtime friend Bette Davis she played in "Lullaby for a Corpse".
mz-web.de.376296.16: His marriage to the writer Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953) produced his son Benjamin Goodrich.
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married the journalist Pierre Paul Galante and had a daughter, Gisbarle, with him.
mz-web.de.376296.19: Rumours of an affair with former British Prime Minister Edward Heath have never been confirmed.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.1: "Road to Timmendorf": Beach volleyball: Thole / Wickler miss final at comeback
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.2: World Cup runners-up Julius Thole and Clemens Wickler missed the final of the "Road to Timmendorf" beach volleyball tournament.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.3: At the meeting of the top teams in Dusseldorf they lost in the semifinals to their national team colleagues Nils Ehlers and Lars flying with 1: 2 (17: 21, 21: 17, 19: 21).
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.4: Thole / Wickler last played at the World Tour Final in Rome in September last year.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.5: In the final on the Rhine their conquerors Ehlers / flew against the surprise team Lukas Pfretschner and his interim partner Steven van de Velde with 0: 2 (17: 21, 17: 21) a defeat.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.6: In addition to the show tournament, three starting places for the German Championships were played at the beginning of September in Timmendorfer Strand: The tickets were secured by Armin Dollinger / Simon Kulzer, Manuel Harms / Richard Peemuller and Simon Pfretschner / Milan Sievers.
paz-online.de.95211.1: Kalbitz expulsion from AfD confirmed - FDP speaks of "fig leaf"
paz-online.de.95211.2: The expulsion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is in the view of the FDP only a "fig leaf" and does not change the character of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.3: "The AfD is the parliamentary arm of the far right in Germany.
paz-online.de.95211.4: Andreas Kalbitz is only part of the tip of the iceberg of the radicals in the AfD, "said FDP interior politician Benjamin Strasser to the dpa news agency in Berlin.
paz-online.de.95211.5: The Federal Arbitration Court of the AfD had confirmed on Saturday in Stuttgart after several hours of hearing the expulsion of Kalbitz, which the Federal Executive Board had decided by a majority in May.
paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD parliamentary group in the Brandenburg state parliament.
paz-online.de.95211.7: "If the AfD really wanted to consistently remove right-wing extremists from their party, functionaries like Bjorn Hoecke and his supporters would have been excluded long ago," Strasser said.
paz-online.de.95211.8: "However, there is no political will to do so in the AfD, because right-wing extremism is now part of the party."
paz-online.de.95211.9: CSU General Secretary Markus Blume expressed a similar opinion: "The fact that Andreas Kalbitz is now excluded says nothing and does not change anything," he told "Welt am Sonntag".
paz-online.de.95211.10: "Rather, it speaks volumes how many frenetic supporters a right-wing extremist in the middle of the AfD still has."
paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume assumes that the AfD will again land below five percent in elections in the future.
paz-online.de.95211.12: "The days of the AfD in the parliaments are numbered".
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the spokesmen of the now officially dissolved "wing" around the Thuringian AfD state and parliamentary group chairman Bjorn Hoehe; the Office for the Protection of the Constitution classifies the coronation as a "secured right-wing extremist effort".
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD federal executive had kicked Kalbitz out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: As a reason, he stated that Kalbitz had not stated an earlier membership in the now banned right-wing extremist "Heimattreue Deutsche Jugend" (HDJ) and the Republicans when he joined the party.
paz-online.de.95211.16: Kalbitz denies membership in the HDJ.
paz-online.de.95211.17: Sebastian Walter, chairman of the Left faction in the Brandenburg state parliament, also stressed that the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court did not change the character of the AfD: "The wolf has only eaten chalk.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD remains a far-right party, with or without Kalbitz. "
paz-online.de.95211.19: Neither the federal party nor the right wing would be weakened by this decision.
paz-online.de.95211.20: "The manoeuvre of the mutineers is transparent.
paz-online.de.95211.21: They want to avoid further observation by the Office for the Protection of the Constitution and try to get under the radar, "said Walter.
paz-online.de.95211.22: "The AfD can't get rid of the ghosts it called.
paz-online.de.95211.23: An expulsion does not change anything, "commented Brandenburg SPD General Secretary Erik Stohn on the decision in the Kalbitz case.
paz-online.de.95211.24: "Here, the AfD regional association and the parliamentary group remained their right-wing leader to this day".
paz-online.de.95211.25: The legal dispute over Kalbitz's membership in the AfD will continue.
paz-online.de.95211.26: He announced on Saturday that he would now take civil action against the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court.
paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea wind farms deliver a good 21 percent more electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.2: The wind power plants on the German North Sea fed 11.51 terawatt hours of electricity into the grid in the first six months of the year.
paz-online.de.95234.3: This is a good 21 percent more than in the same period of the previous year, said network operator Tennet in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: TenneT is responsible for the transmission of the North Sea electricity to the mainland and the transmission through the German electricity grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: The wind turbines on the Baltic Sea, which are not part of Tennet's grid area, have fed in a further 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: Overall, wind power from the North Sea and the Baltic Sea will therefore reach 13.73 TWh, compared with a good 11.64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: The wind harvest at sea thus accounts for almost 19 percent of the total wind power in Germany; this is about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms ensure higher generation capacities
paz-online.de.95234.9: In addition to wind conditions, the increased contribution of offshore wind energy results from higher generation capacities because new wind farms have been connected to the grid in the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1270 wind power plants in the North Sea were all running at full power at the same time, they would be able to generate 6.7 gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient for this; according to Tennet, it is 7.1 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.12: It is planned to increase to 17 gigawatts in the German North Sea by 2030.
paz-online.de.95234.13: "In Germany and the Netherlands, we are investing 20 billion euros in the expansion of offshore grid connections by then," said TenneT Managing Director Tim Meyerjuergens.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, even at sea, wind farms cannot exhaust their capacity, but reach about 40 percent.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The record day so far this year is 2 January, when the North Sea wind farms generated more than six gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, the North Sea wind turbines produce about 2.5 to 3.0 gigawatts of electricity, which corresponds to three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: This could supply almost seven million households with electricity.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.1: Art "Skirmish" - an exhibition of the Leipzig artist Christian Bold in the gallery of the Gmuender Kunstverein.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.2: This was almost a small anniversary celebration for the 130.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.3: The opening of the exhibition "Skirmish" with works by the Leipzig artist Christian Bold went beyond the usual framework after the corona break.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.4: Many more art lovers than usual followed the dialogue between the artist and the chairman of the Kunstverein, Professor Dr. Klaus Ripper.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.5: The musical equivalent was provided by the band "Defenders of the Universe" on the southern Kornhausplatz.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.6: North of the gallery, the association "Sandtogether" was involved.
dnn-online.de.39567.1: Freital: Windbergfest cancelled due to Corona
dnn-online.de.39567.2: The Windbergfest does not take place this year.
dnn-online.de.39567.3: The city of Freital has cancelled the three-day festival planned for September.
dnn-online.de.39567.4: In other years, more than 30,000 people had attended this city festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.5: "We really did not make this decision easy for ourselves and - aware of how difficult it is economically for those involved - hoped until the last minute," explained Lord Mayor Uwe Rumberg (non-partisan).
dnn-online.de.39567.6: "But ultimately, we are responsible for the health of many thousands of people here as organizers."
dnn-online.de.39567.7: If tens of thousands had flocked to the fairgrounds and the marquee, minimum distances, hygiene regulations and contact tracking in accordance with the current Corona Protection Ordinance could not have been observed.
dnn-online.de.39567.8: Or the restrictions would have been so strong that not much would have remained of a folk festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.9: In addition, the organisational and monitoring effort would increase disproportionately.
dnn-online.de.39567.11: Then the city of Freital will celebrate its 100th anniversary with the Winterbergfest from 7 to 9 May 2021 and the Day of the Saxons from 10 to 12 September 2021, among other events.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.1: Dressage Olympic Champion Werth in Achleiten, Germany
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.2: Achleiten - The six-time Olympic champion Isabell Werth was the outstanding rider at the dressage tournament in Achleiten, Austria.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.3: The 51-year-old from Rheinberg scored four victories at four starts this weekend.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.4: After winning one Grand Prix each with Weihegold and Quantaz, she could not be beaten in the Grand Prix Special and the Freestyle on Sunday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.5: On the 15-year-old mare Weihegold Werth prevailed on Sunday in the special against the Austrian Victoria Max-Theurer on Abegglen.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.6: Also in the freestyle on Saturday, the German was clearly ahead of her 34-year-old pupil Victoria Max-Theurer on Quantaz.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.7: Werth's winning horse Quantaz belongs to Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.8: The most successful dressage rider in the world is to establish the ten-year-old stallion in the Grand Prix.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.9: For Quantaz, it was the first freestyle ever.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.10: Werth had already won all four important tests at the first tournament in Achleiten three weeks ago.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.11: The last of the three international tournaments is scheduled for 14 to 16 August.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.1: More air traffic controllers in Worms in future
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: The University of Applied Sciences in Worms is taking to the skies: DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung is endowing a professorship for Air Traffic Management.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding contract between the university and DFS has now been signed in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The contract was initially concluded for three years and will start in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: With the professorship, it is possible to start studying not only in the summer, but also in the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This means that twice as many students can be trained as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, capacity utilisation at both the university and the DFS Air Traffic Control Academy will be uniform.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: DFS will advise the university on setting up and filling the professorship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: Since the summer semester 2019, the first students as part of their training as air traffic controllers at the University of Applied Sciences Worms have been in the Air Traffic Management degree program.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: Nine students have already started this year.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: So far, DFS 'experience has been very positive, and the students' performance has been excellent.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of studies and pilot training makes a significant contribution to further increasing the attractiveness of the pilot profession.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: "In these times, extraction is not easy for us economically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: However, we firmly expect air traffic to recover and grow again in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: In order to continue fulfilling our legal mandate in the future, we need highly qualified personnel, "said Klaus-Dieter Scheurle, Chairman and CEO of DFS, at the signing of the contract.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: "For DFS, the endowed professorship is a future-proof investment that will provide air traffic controllers with a broad, interdisciplinary knowledge base in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.18: We are therefore continuing our good cooperation with the university and at the same time underpinning our attractiveness as an employer. "
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.19: This is also underlined by Professor Dr. Jens Hermsdorf, President of Worms University of Applied Sciences: "The endowed professorship forms an important bridge between science and industry.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.20: With it, we would like to build on our existing cooperation with DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung as a practical partner for the dual bachelor's degree programme in Air Traffic Management. "
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.21: For the University of Applied Sciences Worms, the trust placed in it by the German air navigation service provider is both a motivation and an obligation to further expand its teaching and research expertise in the future fields of air traffic.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.22: In its commitment to the air traffic controllers of tomorrow, the university can set very special highlights and innovative priorities for its students with the first endowed professorship for a dual course of study.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.23: Dr. Denis Alt, State Secretary at the Ministry of Science, Continuing Education and Culture, emphasises: "With its focus on air transport, Worms University of Applied Sciences has a unique selling point in Rhineland-Palatinate.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.24: Today's signing of the cooperation agreement strengthens the profile of the university. "

main-netz.de.61826.4: The driver suffered minor injuries to his face and had to be taken to a hospital for treatment.
main-netz.de.61826.5: The 72-year-old passenger's injuries were treated by the emergency doctor and the patient was then flown to a hospital by rescue helicopter.
main-netz.de.61826.6: At present, however, the police assume that there is no danger to life.

mittelbayerische.de.307327.1: Heil wants to examine other industries after meat industry
mittelbayerische.de.307327.2: The Corona crisis brought the conditions in parts of the meat industry to light again.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.4: But are they legitimate - and will they remain so?
mittelbayerische.de.307327.5: Federal Minister of Labour Hubertus Heil (SPD) wants to review other sectors in accordance with the now planned strict regulations against grievances in the meat industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.6: "We will look at industry by industry and then take appropriate measures for the respective industry if necessary," said Heil of the German Press Agency in Berlin.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.7: Germany's employers are already warning against restricting work contracts in general.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.8: After the massive corona outbreak at the meat giant Tonnies in North Rhine-Westphalia, the Federal Cabinet wants to pass a law of salvation this Wednesday.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.9: Large slaughterhouses should no longer be allowed to employ external personnel for slaughter, cutting and meat processing.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.10: To this end, the use of contract workers and temporary workers is to be banned there.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.11: Employer President Ingo Kramer told the dpa: "Stay away from a general restriction of contracts for work and temporary employment, if you do not want to strangle the economy completely".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.12: Contracts for work and services, for example, are the basis for creating added value for customers in a wide range of trades, the construction industry and plant engineering.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.13: "The misconduct of individuals cannot destroy such an important instrument".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.14: Heil assured: "My goal is not to ban contracts for work and services everywhere in the German economy."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.15: Contracts for work and services make sense.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.16: "When an industrial company commissions a craftsman to install a safety system, this is a normal contract for work and services."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.17: The German meat industry considers a ban on contracts for work and temporary agency work in its sector alone to be unconstitutional.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.18: It is not possible to explain why different labour law should apply to portioning and packaging of cheese in the future than to sausages, according to a statement on the draft law, as reported by the "Neue Osnabruecker Zeitung" (Saturday).
mittelbayerische.de.307327.19: A ban would therefore increase the consumer price by 10 to 20 percent per kilo and product.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.20: According to the results of an audit by the North Rhine-Westphalia Occupational Safety and Health Administration, many Eastern European employees from contracted work companies worked 16 hours a day in the industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.22: Wages were withheld for protective equipment or rent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.23: It was also noted that the situation with the accommodation of employees was often miserable.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.24: Heil said that a relatively harsh law had already come into force for the meat industry in 2017.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.25: However, these were bypassed by "tricky constructions".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.26: "Now we have to clean up fundamentally".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.27: The politician announced: "In the Occupational Safety and Health Act, which we want to adopt in the cabinet at the end of July, there are also measures that do not only affect the meat industry - for example, higher inspection rates for occupational safety and health or clear criteria for community accommodation".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.28: The draft presented to the dpa includes amendments to the Act on the Protection of Employee Rights in the Meat Industry and the Occupational Safety and Health Act.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.29: Brandenburg's Consumer Protection Minister Ursula Nonnemacher (Greens) believes that more intensive controls are necessary.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.30: "I would like us to be able to carry out even more inspections in many areas of supervision: Food inspections, animal welfare, everything possible, including animal transport," said Nonnemacher on Sunday in the RBB programme "Brandenburg aktuell".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.31: However, more controls would also require more staff positions.

rundschau-online.de.151934.1: Evacuation of Frankfurt Opernplatz proceeded peacefully
rundschau-online.de.151934.2: One week after the riots in Frankfurt, the evacuation of the Opernplatz took place peacefully on Sunday night.
rundschau-online.de.151934.3: A few dozen people remained in the square, but left before the curfew began at 1 o'clock.
rundschau-online.de.151934.4: The police had been in action since the early evening with numerous officers, and a larger police force could be seen throughout the city.
rundschau-online.de.151934.5: For the first time this weekend, from midnight onwards, there was a ban on entering the Opernplatz, where riots had occurred a week ago.

rundschau-online.de.151934.8: The night to Saturday had also remained quiet.

hna.de.247362.2: In an accident between Schoeneberg and Huemme, a 21-year-old suffered serious injuries at around 1.25 pm on Sunday.
hna.de.247362.3: She was taken to Kassel Hospital.
hna.de.247362.4: The fire brigade used thermal imaging cameras to search for possible passengers.
hna.de.247362.5: According to the police, the woman was on her way to her place of residence on federal highway 83, when her car got off the road for an unknown reason and rolled over several times.
hna.de.247362.6: In order to save the victims, the fire brigade had to cut the roof of the passenger car.
hna.de.247362.7: Since it was unclear whether there was anyone else in the vehicle, the adjacent corn field was scanned from the turntable ladder with a thermal imaging camera.
hna.de.247362.8: The drone squadron from Warburg, which also works with thermal imaging cameras, had also been ordered to search for people.
hna.de.247362.9: However, the volunteers did not find anyone between the tall maize plants.
hna.de.247362.10: The seriously injured woman was taken by ambulance to the Kassel hospital for further care.
hna.de.247362.11: Nearly 50 firefighters from the fire brigade Hofgeismar, Huemme and Schoeneberg were on site.
hna.de.247362.12: The highway was closed for two hours due to the accident.

schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.1: Baden-Wuerttemberg: Over 250 illegal car races recorded
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.2: Stuttgart - Despite all the threatened penalties and court judgments, motorists continue to accelerate in countless illegal races on the roads of Baden-Wuerttemberg: Last year and in the first four months of this year, the police in the southwest have already registered more than 250 illegal car races.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.3: There are no comparable figures for the years before, but the speeders are increasingly doing the judicial authorities work: A total of 155 investigations into illegal races were conducted at the public prosecutors' offices between Constance and Mannheim in 2018, one year later there were already 252 and 151 in the current year until the beginning of June.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.4: The races were less about organized events, as can be seen from the response of the Ministry of the Interior to a request of the Landtag SPD.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.5: In most cases, the drivers had spontaneously competed against each other or they had fled from the police - this is also reported as an illegal race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.6: The drivers were mainly German men between the ages of 18 and 60.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.8: Only in comparatively few cases are the speeders caught and also asked to pay: According to the Ministry of the Interior, a total of 113 fines have been imposed since 2018 and 15 imprisonment sentences have been imposed.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.9: However, there is no evidence that the number of illegal car races is actually increasing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.10: Rather, other motorists reacted more sensitively than before because of the numerous tragic accidents and processes of recent years and reported more frequently, said a ministry spokesman.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.11: Especially popular with speeders is the Autobahn 8, where drivers repeatedly slow down the traffic to make room for themselves and use the free track for a race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.12: Last August, a dozen drivers were caught near Kirchheim unter Teck, three months earlier there were even 18 drivers on the A8 near Merklingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.14: On the A81, the police register even more races than on any other federal highway.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.15: With a speed limit there is an attempt to slow down the speeders on the particularly affected section between Engen and Geisingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.16: The mostly high-priced and pimped up sports and luxury cars often have Swiss license plates, because the drivers turn to Germany because of the high penalties for driving too fast and car racing in the neighboring country.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.17: For the SPD, the speed limit must not be reduced to a few routes: "With a general speed limit of 130 kilometers per hour, we would get rid of this problem on motorways," says Martin Rivoir, the transport expert of the SPD parliamentary group.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.18: "The inhibition threshold for speeders would be significantly higher if you were not allowed to travel legally here and there at 200 kilometers per hour or more."
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.19: Rivoir thinks less of education or image campaigns: "Those who flout all the rules in such a way and risk not only their own lives, but also the lives of other road users, can hardly be reached with reason".
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.20: ADAC calls for stronger police action
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.21: However, this is not enough for the ADAC: "We assume that speeders will not be deterred by the speed limits," says Holger Bach, Head of the Transport and Environment Department at the ADAC Wuerttemberg.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.22: It calls for additional and tougher controls on the routes concerned.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.23: Not infrequently, the high-speed test of strength turns into painful and momentous seriousness: Since January 2019 and until April 2020, three people have died in the races nationwide, two of them uninvolved in a nightly crash in Stuttgart's city center and one in Gerlingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.24: Two young men are said to have competed in a car race there in November.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.25: One of the vehicles came off the road, crashed into a garden wall and remained on the side, the 18-year-old passenger died.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.26: 21 other people were injured in the races of the past two years.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.27: According to Interior Minister Thomas Strobl, however, tougher penalties are not necessary: "There is no need for legislative action to impose tougher sanctions on illegal motor vehicle races," says the Interior Ministry's paper.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.1: July 23 Blue Light: Thirsty Burglar Steals Drinks from Snack Bar
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.2: Rohrdorf: A man broke into a snack bar in Rohrdorf (Calw district) on Thursday and stole drinks and cash.

schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.4: There he noticed a man who served himself drinks at the fridge and then left the snack bar through a previously smashed front door.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.5: The perpetrator fled towards the meadows behind the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.6: According to the police, the burglar also used a cash register and stole cash in the low three-digit range.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.7: The suspect is described as follows: He is about 1.75 to 1.80 meters tall and of strong stature.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.8: In fact, he wore a black hooded sweater, black trousers and bright shoes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.9: Further evidence is received by the police.
pnp.de.390142.1: Ackermann sprints to victory on final stage at Sibiu Tour
pnp.de.390142.2: Professional cyclist Pascal Ackermann has won his second day on the final stage of the 10th Sibiu Tour.
pnp.de.390142.3: The 26-year-old Palatinate rider from the Bora-hansgrohe team prevailed in the mass sprint on the 109-kilometre-long section with start and finish in Sibiu, having already won a stage on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.4: It was the third and fourth season for Ackermann.
pnp.de.390142.5: In the overall classification, his Austrian teammate Gregor Muehlberger prevailed.
pnp.de.390142.6: The 26-year-old had confidently won the mountain time trial in the morning and thus took the lead in the classification.
pnp.de.390142.7: Only 104 riders were left for the final stage in the evening.
pnp.de.390142.8: No fewer than 18 starters had fallen victim to the time limit in the mountain time trial.
pnp.de.390142.9: "I'm really happy to start the new season with a victory," Ackermann said after his success on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.10: "The sprint was really hectic," said the 26-year-old.
pnp.de.390142.11: With 300 meters to go, he simply put on his sprint, "and it worked perfectly."
pnp.de.390142.12: In accordance with the rules of the UCI, a corona test was carried out on all participants and their companions six days before the start of the race.
pnp.de.390142.13: During the entire tour, the driver and attendant were separated from the organising team and the media in isolated hygiene bubbles.
pnp.de.390142.14: Spectators at the start and finish were not allowed.
bild.254818.1: Control center gave instructions for lay resuscitation
bild.254818.2: Dusseldorf - Tragic accident on Sunday afternoon in Dusseldorf-Garath.
