bild.254818.6: The rescuers arrived a little later and took over the resuscitation measures.
bild.254818.7: The child, who was in mortal danger, was transported to the university hospital under resuscitation.
bild.254818.9: The police have routinely started investigating the accident.
bild.254818.10: The spokesman for the fire brigade: "We assume a tragic accident in the apartment".
infranken.de.309656.1: Nuremberg: Unauthorized tuning meeting - police intervenes, 700 vehicles and about 1100 people
infranken.de.309656.2: Hundreds of cars and at times over 1000 people took part in a "tuning meeting" on Saturday night in the parking lot of a furniture store.
infranken.de.309656.3: The police carried out their announcement to intensify their control of such events.
infranken.de.309656.4: A large tuning meeting took place on Saturday evening (25 July 2020) in Nuremberg's southern city.
infranken.de.309656.6: According to the police of Middle Franconia, an increased volume of vehicles in the area of a large car park in Ingolstadt Street was detected by the Nuremberg traffic police at around 10.30 pm.
infranken.de.309656.7: As a result, the police carried out a large number of vehicle inspections there.
infranken.de.309656.8: Only recently, the police had announced that they wanted to step up their action against so-called autoposers.
infranken.de.309656.9: Illegal tuning meeting in Nuremberg: Only a small part of the "scene"
infranken.de.309656.10: The officers were among the top 700 vehicles and about 1100 people, according to the police.
infranken.de.309656.11: However, only a small part of those present can be attributed to the "autoposer" and tuning scene.
infranken.de.309656.12: Apparently, the majority of the relevant scene complied with the appeal of the police.
infranken.de.309656.13: On the basis of the vehicles and people on site, it can be assumed that these were mainly onlookers.
infranken.de.309656.14: In addition, the majority of those present adhered to the applicable infection protection regulations, in particular the observance of the minimum distance and the wearing of a mouth-nose protection.
infranken.de.309656.15: The control measures carried out on site were completed at around 1: 00 a.m.
infranken.de.309656.16: In total, the officials found such structural changes in 10 vehicles that the operating license had expired.
infranken.de.309656.17: Four of these vehicles had to be secured.
infranken.de.309656.19: There were no illegal car races.
infranken.de.309656.20: "The police headquarters in Middle Franconia will continue to keep an eye on what is happening and will continue to carry out intensified control measures, also in connection with the emergence of onlookers," it said.
infranken.de.309656.21: The agency News5 spoke with Juergen Schroedinger from the towing company involved: "They all have beautiful rims, which we must not scratch," says Schroedinger.
infranken.de.309656.22: Special tapes would be used for this purpose.
infranken.de.309656.23: Also because the cars are wider, the company must be careful not to damage them.
infranken.de.309656.24: "After all, the young people should get their cars back unscathed."
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.1: Figures from the Employment Agency: 900 suspected cases of abuse in short-time work
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.2: Berlin - The Federal Employment Agency (BA) is investigating around 900 suspected cases of abuse of short-time work allowance.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.3: "This is extremely low for more than 880,000 companies that have reported short-time work," Daniel Terzenbach, the board member responsible for operations, told the Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.4: When, at the beginning of the Corona crisis, a large number of companies suddenly applied for short-time work, the BA had to react quickly.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.5: The examination usually takes up to three weeks.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.6: "We didn't have that much time during this hot phase.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.7: All the more closely we will look at the final accounts.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.8: There will certainly be more to come.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.9: We are not naive and have perseverance. "
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.10: Indications of abuse often come from the affected employees or trade unions.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.11: In addition, the BA uses analysis software to identify patterns of abuse.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.12: According to Terzenbach, the BA is preparing for a possible wave of insolvency in the autumn.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.13: "Will there be significantly more insolvencies than in the previous year?
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.14: The assessments differ, but we are preparing ourselves in the event of a case and are already training our employees in the employment agencies to process applications for insolvency benefits. "
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.15: The figures are still inconspicuous, said Terzenbach.
pnn.de.185998.1: World Heritage in Potsdam: Party in the New Garden dissolved
pnn.de.185998.2: Potsdam - On Friday evening, about 40 young people celebrated a party in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.3: The collection was dissolved at 8.48 p.m. by the drivers of the Prussian Palaces and Gardens Foundation (SPSG), the foundation informed on PNN request.
pnn.de.185998.4: The young people then left the park.
pnn.de.185998.5: On Saturday evening, some young people would have played rugby in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.6: The meadow had been cleared by district drivers, said SPSG spokesman Frank Kallensee on Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.7: There are always illegal celebrations in the parks
pnn.de.185998.8: In the parks of the Foundation, there are always accumulations in which the distance and hygiene rules COVID-19 contact regulations are not observed.
pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June there was a celebration with about 300 people in the Babelsberg Park, a week later about 150 people celebrated in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without a corona regulation, the parks are closed at dusk.
pnn.de.185998.11: Camping on the meadows is prohibited by park regulations, there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has been complaining for a long time that visitors are leaving more and more garbage and destroying protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: Meanwhile, illegal park parties have taken on a different dimension in Berlin.
pnn.de.185998.14: On Sunday night 5000 people celebrated an illegal techno party in the Hasenheide in the district of Neukoelln.
pnn.de.185998.15: The event was dissolved by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass tests after corona outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: Authorities have responded to a corona outbreak in the popular Upper Austrian tourist resort of St. Wolfgang with hundreds of tests.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, as the state authorities in Linz announced.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still pending in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: According to this, many of the infected are young interns in tourism companies, but at least one holiday guest was tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism staff were asked to stay in their accommodation on Saturday night.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: "There are cancellations and cancellations of bookings here and there," said the head of the Wolfgangsee Tourism Association, Hans Wieser, to the dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.9: Some of the guests also left early.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the most important tourist resort in Upper Austria, with more than 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season, about a third of the guests are Germans.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: On Friday the first infections had become public knowledge.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: The head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended the behaviour of the trainees on Saturday, who had celebrated in several restaurants and could have contracted the disease there.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: "We all enjoyed doing this in our youth," he told the radio station Oe1.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The Tourism Board launched an information campaign to raise awareness among young employees of the dangers of COVID-19.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.17: From Saturday onwards, hundreds of employees, holidaymakers and locals were tested.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.18: In addition, all guests who were in St. Wolfgang from 15 July were contacted.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak evokes memories of the Austrian ski and party resort of Ischgl in Tyrol, which was a center of corona spread throughout Europe in the early phase of the pandemic.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: In total, more than 1500 people in Austria are currently infected with the virus.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: The focus of the new infections is on Vienna and Upper Austria.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualified for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (dpa) - English football record champions Manchester United return to the Champions League after a year's absence.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils finished third in the Premier League with a 2-0 win over Leicester City.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes now have to be content with the Europa League, because Chelsea FC passed by and also qualified for the premier league in fourth place.
wn.de.700458.5: In the fight against relegation, Aston Villa was allowed to cheer.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead with a penalty kick from Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in injury time, Jesse Lingard (90th + 8) scored the final score.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, in the Champions League round of 16 opponent of FC Bayern, won thanks to Mason Mount (45th + 1) and Olivier Giroud (45th + 4) in parallel with 2-0 (2-0) against Wolverhampton Wanderers.
wn.de.700458.9: "That means a lot to me," said coach Frank Lampard, who is also in the FA Cup final against Arsenal in his first season as Chelsea coach.
wn.de.700458.10: Chelsea's victory over Wolverhampton also benefited Tottenham Hotspur, who passed the Wolves 1-1 (1-0) at Crystal Palace and started sixth in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa won the long-distance duel with Watford and AFC Bournemouth, but had to tremble at West Ham United for a long time for the class preservation.
wn.de.700458.12: The late lead of Jack Grealish (84.) immediately compensated Andrej Yarmolenko (85.).
wn.de.700458.13: However, the 1: 1 (0: 0) was sufficient because Watford lost against Arsenal with 2: 3 (1: 3).
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which had three coaches in the season, was relegated after five years in the first division.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, who could not save themselves by a 3-1 (2-1) at Everton FC.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, one point was missing.
wn.de.700458.17: Liverpool, who have been English champions since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3-1 (1-1) victory at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 points is the highest score the Reds have ever scored in a football season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Juergen Klopp and his team narrowly missed the point record in English football.
wn.de.700458.20: Manchester City holds the record with 100 points during the 2017 / 18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After the Newcastle lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38th), Divock Origi (59th) and Sadio Man (89th) turned the game on Sunday for Liverpool.
wn.de.700458.22: "It was an extraordinary season for this wonderful club," said goalscorer van Dijk after the match, "which should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: The Premier League bosses are also likely to be satisfied in the end.
wn.de.700458.25: Due to the coronavirus crisis, football operations in England were suspended from 13 March to 17 June.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, there has even been discussion about a premature termination or the remaining matches being played on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: In the end, however, the season could be played without any special incidents - but as in Germany without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence at demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Netanyahu's head of government are becoming increasingly fierce.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: During the night there were violent clashes.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: On the night of Sunday in Jerusalem, the Israeli police took violent action against participants in a demonstration against right-wing conservative Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Twelve people were arrested for participating in riots, police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: Among other things, the police used water cannons to disperse the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, a total of around 6,000 people had gathered near Netanyahu's office on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They protested against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the Corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants in a counter-demonstration supporting Netanyahu were also detained, the news site "ynet" reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the head of government's private villa in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: According to police, a man was arrested near Tel Aviv on suspicion of having sprayed pepper spray on demonstrators on the roadside from a moving car.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a stabbing attack on a demonstrator in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The demonstrator was slightly injured in the neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: In Jerusalem and Tel Aviv there have recently been several demonstrations against Netanyahu.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption process against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Recently, Netanyahu has also been criticized for his handling of the Corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he is accused of premature easing and a lack of preparation for a second corona wave.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The Corona crisis has hit the country's economy hard.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate recently stood at more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new infections with the coronavirus in Israel has recently risen to record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident at Ahlen (North Rhine-Westphalia) - Transporter crashes on car - nine injured - Ruhrgebiet - Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision on Saturday afternoon on the B58 near Ahlen caused nine minor injuries.
bild.254850.3: A female driver was driving with her two children (3, 5) towards Beckum.
bild.254850.4: The police: "Presumably she had suddenly slowed down because she wanted to turn".
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van, who was driving behind her, must have seen this too late.
bild.254850.6: He crashed into the back of the car.
bild.254850.7: Three occupants in the car and six in the van were slightly injured in the accident.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took her to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off border town after Corona-suspected case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far seen its own measures to combat the coronavirus as a "shining success".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: Now the country is reporting on a suspected case for the first time.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Because of a first official corona suspicion in the country, North Korea has completely sealed off a large city for fear of a catastrophe.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the most stringent epidemiological defenses in the past six months, "the malignant virus may have been introduced into the country," the state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: A state of emergency has been declared for the region around the border town of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The Communist leadership declared the highest level of alarm.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If confirmed, it would be the first official case of SARS-CoV-2 infection in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: North Korea claims not to have registered a single infection and described its defenses as a "shining success."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: The disease symptoms were reportedly found in an "outlier" who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person fled to South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: For the border crossing within the four kilometers wide and mostly still mined military buffer zone, there was initially no confirmation from South Korea.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: However, according to reports by the national news agency Yonhap, South Korea's military admitted the possibility of an illegal border crossing to North Korea as high.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: There have been investigations into some of them.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: North Korea called an emergency meeting of the Labor Party Politburo, chaired by Kim Jong Un, on Saturday on suspicion.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The "dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive catastrophe".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: Kim had already ordered on Friday as a preventive measure "to completely block Kaesong and isolate each district and the region from others," it continued.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The person concerned, as well as all people in Kaesong who had had contact with her, had been placed under quarantine.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: The central military commission of the party should investigate the "breakaway case" as well as the behavior of the responsible military unit and, if necessary, impose severe punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: It is estimated that there are approximately 300,000 people living in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Tension ahead of Council meeting: City-east and noise abatement still to be discussed before summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: "In addition to environmental issues, the committee members will also vote on the development plan for the major project inner-city development east," it says rather casually in the middle part of the city press release for the next municipal council meeting on Tuesday, July 28, at 4.30 pm in the main hall of the CongressCentrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: Above all, however, the upgrading of the eastern city is controversially discussed until the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities in favour of it are scarce, most recently even rejecting it in individual committees, depending on their attendance.
pz-news.de.72354.5: Reinhard Klein criticized an appeal from the economy (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project developed by the citizenry and then by the administration and the local council now fail after almost ten years of preparation as "extra-parliamentary opposition", "unsuspecting", "speculation", "denigration" and "deliberate false statements".
pz-news.de.72354.6: "Everyone thinks they know better," says Klein, who has been the only representative of the Pforzheim Citizens' List on the municipal council for a year.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, after reading the Treaties, he was in this position: "I know what I am talking about".
pz-news.de.72354.8: The exit would be cheaper for the city, the Technical City Hall is contrary to statements of the city administration after subsidies, of the existence of which Klein is convinced to rehabilitate for 8.5 million euros.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The city will develop in a completely different way than predicted in the town hall and by supporters from the economy.
pz-news.de.72354.10: One day after Klein, the FDP / FW / UB / LED faction, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: Essentially, it also provides for the renovation of the Technical Town Hall, the keeping open of the Schlossberg, the leasing of the former valley for administrative space and a more small-scale inner city redevelopment, ideally with local sponsors.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: In addition, environmental issues will play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the municipal council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the population of Pforzheim from health noise pollution caused by road traffic, including many speed reductions.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local transport club Germany welcomes the widespread introduction of Tempo 30. However, the political leaders in the city are not innocent of the fact that this must happen, because they have only contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus noise by neglecting regular bus traffic with thinned out cycles and by little commitment to cycling, according to the VCD.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The municipal council also votes on the participation of the city of the Energy and Climate Protection Agency Pforzheim / Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: In addition, the agenda includes accession to the Baden-Wuerttemberg Climate Protection Pact, the reassessment of parental contributions in the municipal daycare facilities and the application for admission to the federal government's Smart City funding.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must heed corona protection measures.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann starts the new season with a lot of delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: Tim Zimmermann will start his debut season in the ADAC GT Masters on 31 July with a delay of almost half a year.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the league of super sports cars can start regular operation, the first test runs have now been scheduled.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, it was all about getting to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: For a long time, the Corona crisis prevented Tim Zimmermann from tackling his first official race in the new Lamborghini Huracan of Grasser Racing.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: This was now possible under special hygiene conditions.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old from Langenargen completed his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his debut in the GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: "There are already a few things that are different from the Porsche from the previous season," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: "With ABS, for example, you have to go into corners differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really great fun. "
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst, with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: Despite his only 25 years of experience in GT racing, the Dutchman has been able to help his new teammate in many things.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: "I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series brings with it new challenges," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: "Steijn and I get along brilliantly and we have also made enormous progress from session to session at the Lausitzring."
schwaebische.de.113555.15: Right there - at the Lausitzring - the GT Masters will also hold its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From 31 July, the 33 supercars will race through Lusatia.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: Zimmermann, who is one of 15 newcomers to the series, knows the track.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: In 2015 he was most recently guest at the Motodrom.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: "It worked quickly and I didn't have to get used to the track much," says Zimmermann, who starts for the Friedrichshafen racing community Graf Zeppelin.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: "The Lausitzring has many fast passages that you have to hit optimally to be fast".
schwaebische.de.113555.21: How fast Zimmermann really is then turns out in two weeks.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: "Of course, the teams play poker a little during the tests," he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: "In the end, however, we are very satisfied and look forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring".
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the start of a crowded calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: Seven races are scheduled until the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current state is that no spectators will be allowed - but there is a prominent guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: In mid-August, former Formula One driver Niko Huelkenberg will take over the GT steering wheel.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British Transport Minister cold-caught by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: The British government's decision to quarantine holidaymakers in Spain for two weeks after their return has, according to press reports, caught the country's transport minister off guard.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: According to this, Grant Shapps is currently on holiday in Spain, of all places, while his colleagues at home decided on the measure on Saturday.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Due to the increase in corona numbers in Spain, the cabinet in London removed the country from the list of countries from which entry without quarantine conditions is possible.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new regulation will apply from today, Sunday, so Shapps will also have to be quarantined after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures on returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: But for those who are only on holiday on the cut-off date, the scheme will only apply from Saturday, 1 August, and was not introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: Spain, by the way, is one of the "safe countries" in Austria for which no quarantine is required.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: "Many ministers may have known in advance that there is a possibility that a quarantine will be imposed on holidaymakers in Spain", commented Labour MEP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: "But apparently no one bothered to tell Grant Shapps."
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Less than a month after the end of the corona emergency in Spain and the end of the strict curfew, the number of infections in the country is rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists mainly blame the nightlife for the new spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of the British people's favourite holiday destinations.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government is currently advising against unnecessary travel to mainland Spain, with the exception of the Canary Islands and Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular with British holidaymakers.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: So far, more than 272,000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28,000 deaths have been registered in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced on the occasion of Naval Day in his country that warships will be equipped with the most modern hypersonic weapons.
mz-web.de.376126.3: These weapons, which are unique in the world, would expand the combat capabilities of the Russian naval forces, Putin said on Sunday in St. Petersburg at the central naval parade.
mz-web.de.376126.4: According to Interfax, the Ministry of Defense also informed about successful tests of the Zirkon hypersonic missile built for the navy.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a multiple of the speed of sound of about 343 meters per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are considered weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.7: Underwater tropedeo is still being built
mz-web.de.376126.8: The nuclear submarine torpedo Poseidon will continue to be built, it was said.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned sea drone is planned to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The president, who himself also drove a military boat, said that this year alone 40 new ships would be put into service with the individual fleet units of the largest country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has such a large coastal area as no other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: For 300 years, the navy has reliably protected Russia, Putin said on the day celebrated by sailors nationwide.
mz-web.de.376126.13: At many other Russian coastal towns, the naval forces also celebrated the Day of the Navy with parades.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting alongside ruler Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated strength at an arms show in the Mediterranean port of Tartu.
mz-web.de.376126.16: A video released by the Ministry of Defence showed not only warships, including a submarine, but also combat helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane "Hanna" reaches Texas: Help because of Corona more difficult
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - The first hurricane of this year's season over the Atlantic has hit land in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening floods, strong winds and heavy rainfall are now threatening parts of the US state, the National Hurricane Center told the US climate agency NOAA on the night of Sunday (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for many districts.
tt.com.149061.5: The corona pandemic raging in Texas is making the work of aid workers more difficult, Abbott said, according to US media.
tt.com.149061.7: "Every hurricane is a huge challenge," Abbott said according to the Houston Chronicle.
tt.com.149061.8: With regard to the hurricane in Texas, he added, "This challenge is complicated and exacerbated when you consider that it is sweeping through an area that is the most COVID-19 affected area in the state."
tt.com.149061.9: According to Johns Hopkins University, around 5,000 people have died in Texas alone as a result of the corona pandemic.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott called on people who had to leave their homes to be careful.
tt.com.149061.11: They should not disregard practices "to which we have become accustomed," such as wearing masks, the governor said, according to CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It was important that everyone kept their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: Therefore, hotel rooms have also been provided in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, tests should be carried out in emergency shelters on Corona.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage was initially reported only from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: With wind speeds of up to 150 kilometers per hour, "Hanna" was hit on land on the island of Padre Island just off the Texas coast, according to the authorities.
tt.com.149061.18: The storm had previously been upgraded to a low-level hurricane.
tt.com.149061.19: For the coastal section from Port Mansfield to Sargent, a storm surge warning had been issued and later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected a weakening, while "Hanna" moved further inland and headed for northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, Hurricane Douglas was on its way to Hawaii during the night on Sunday with wind speeds of around 150 kilometers per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: However, the hurricane center expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it will be near Hawaii's largest islands on Sunday (local time) - then as a storm just below the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: According to a forecast from May, NOAA expected an above-average hurricane season over the Atlantic this year.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes can be expected, of which up to six could become very strong hurricanes, the authority had explained.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic, three of which develop into storms of great strength.
tt.com.149061.28: In view of available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and the Caribbean, the probability of a normal season was only 30 percent, and that of a below-average even only 10 percent, it was said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: Us President Donald Trump wrote on Twitter that his administration is closely monitoring the storms and is in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals stripped: Video assistant "punished" Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolos Filip Djuricic were stripped of two goals
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Naples - Four goals scored, four goals deprived: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a pitch-black evening at the 0-2 (0-1) SSC Naples in the Italian football league Serie A - and was really angry at the video assistant of the referee.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: "A festival of ungiven gates for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: Never before has the VAR acted so hard against a team, "commented the" Corriere dello Sport ".
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Host Naples had taken the lead in the 8th minute with a goal from defender Elseid Hisaj, while Filip Djuricic cheered for the equalizer in the 32nd minute.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) withdrew the goal due to an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later, Djuricic kicked the ball back into the net - again the VAR intervened.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: The goals of attackers Francesco Caputo (50th) and Domenico Berardi (61st) were also withdrawn by the referee team according to the advice of the UAR.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: In injury time, Allan made the 2-0 final score for Naples and the bitter evening for Sassuolo perfect.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: "The VAR is worse for Sassuolo than a radar trap on the road and punishes Sassuolo like no other team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology sets new records, "writes the" Gazzetta dello Sport ".
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - The start of the hot preparation phase for the Champions League began with a setback for Doublesieger FC Bayern.
wn.de.700404.3: Hansi Flick, who recovered "reasonably well" after a short holiday and a few days of training, has to think about how he can rebuild his successful defense after the injury of world champion Benjamin Pavard.
wn.de.700404.4: The Frenchman, who has the third most minutes behind captain Manuel Neuer and midfielder Joshua Kimmich, suffered a ligament injury at the left foot and threatens to be absent in decisive royal class duels.
wn.de.700404.5: In Munich's dirty weather, the right-back broke off a training game and was driven off the course with a golf kart.
wn.de.700404.6: How long the unrestricted regular player has to pause in the fight for the title remains to be seen.
wn.de.700404.7: An appearance in the second leg of the round of 16 against Chelsea FC on 8 August should be difficult, the 24-year-old can hope for the final tournament starting on 12 August in Lisbon.
wn.de.700404.8: However, the Bavarians do not want to be stopped by the mishap from the training on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.9: In his personal triple formula, Flick named the three attributes he wants to see from his stars on their way to Portugal's capital.
wn.de.700404.10: Quality, intensity and concentration are to show his victorious title collectors in the ideally following 28 days until the king class final on 23 August.
wn.de.700404.11: "We have mastered the compulsory tasks with championship and trophy simply outstanding.
wn.de.700404.12: Now we need to create something special, "said Flick.
wn.de.700404.13: Until the Munichers can deal with the final tournament and before a training camp in the Algarve, but first of all the eighth final duty against Chelsea FC.
wn.de.700404.14: After the 3-0 in the first leg before the Corona break, the Londoners should not become a Bayern nightmare again in their home arena as in the lost "Finale dahoam" 2012.
wn.de.700404.15: "We have to go through the door first.
wn.de.700404.16: We want to win, create good conditions and recharge our batteries with a good game, "demanded Flick.
wn.de.700404.17: A test for attunement is scheduled on Friday against Olympique Marseille.
wn.de.700404.18: With a long speech, Flick had sworn his stars, who had 13 days vacation after the double, to a unique August.
wn.de.700404.19: He greeted 31 players on Sabre Street, including the new players around high-end shopping Leroy San, who met all new colleagues on the field for the first time after his move from Manchester City.
wn.de.700404.20: "Leroy, like all the newcomers, fitted in well," Flick reported.
wn.de.700404.21: But instead of talking about the new season, when Sanguine & Co. are no longer only allowed to train, Flick preferred to talk about the current title project of the German series champion.
wn.de.700404.22: After days of individual and small group training, the team is now training for the Londoners, who, in contrast to the Flick ensemble, are in the rhythm of the game.
wn.de.700404.23: After that Munich could face a quarter-final against FC Barcelona and Lionel Messi, in the semi-finals Real Madrid, Manchester City or Juventus Turin are possible opponents.
wn.de.700404.24: A way to the final in Lisbon "is not that easy," stressed the head coach, who can rely on the services of his new assistant Miroslav Klose in training from Tuesday onwards.
wn.de.700404.25: The World Cup record scorer Klose and Flick know from many a joint tournament preparation, what is particularly important in the 0-on-100 attunement.
wn.de.700404.26: With his current team, working is "a pleasure," praised Flick.
wn.de.700404.27: The "focus on winning" is an impressive trait of his team.
wn.de.700404.28: The tournament with nine teams was also ambitious on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.29: All of the top performers were there, including Thiago and defender David Alaba, whose whereabouts are not certain beyond the premier league season.
salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to choose its world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to drive on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise in order to award the World Championship titles.
salzburg.com.306641.3: All races in the United States were cancelled.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Race calendar is becoming more and more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The racing calendar for the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten confirmed Grand Prix so far, three other race tracks were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October it will be driven at the Nuerburgring in Germany and in the Portuguese Portimo.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On the first of November, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will fight for World Championship points at the traditional Italian race track in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: This means that the 2020 race calendar currently comprises 13 rounds.
salzburg.com.306641.10: "We are pleased to continue to make great progress in finalizing our plans for the 2020 season," said Formula One boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: A total of 15 to 18 races in the premier class of motorsport are to be completed in this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 wants to conclude its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar is to be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: Before the already officially planned races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December, media reports suggest that appearances in Vietnam and Malaysia could take place at the end of November.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: However, the Formula 1 regulations require at least races on three continents for the allocation of the World Championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, only two continents will be driven, there is to be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles on the basis of "exceptional circumstances" due to the coronavirus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start of the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the looming corona crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent later this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 will not be visiting America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Cancellation met with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense corona situation, the races will not take place in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.24: "We look forward to being with them again next season," Carey said.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the America races was met with criticism, especially in Brazil: "The cancellation did not come as a surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for it," said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in SSojourn o Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: For example, the number of infections in the So Paulo area is significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: In addition, the concerns of some teams not wanting to drive in Brazil would not justify a rejection.
salzburg.com.306641.28: Be prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil eye against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert's famous late-night show via video and revealed in an interview what she had in mind when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Klimaatkivistin Greta Thunberg was a guest on a popular US late-night show via video.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she talked about her fight against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also talked about her famous "evil eye" when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - Over the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has attracted attention with her tireless commitment to the "Fridays For Future" movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke in a well-known late-night show about her plans for the future as well as her meeting with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Latenight presenter Stephen Colbert welcomed 17-year-old Thunberg to your show on Tuesday and conducted a lengthy interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She spoke not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: "There are some things that surprised me," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: "How far people are going to shift the focus away from the climate crisis," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: "Everything from organized hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children take to the streets," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: She finds heads of state and leading politicians who mock her on social media or even try to silence her "funny" because they show her the reactions "because they have no other answer".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview when Greta Thunberg was asked about a well-known scene in which she cast a bitter look after US President Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the UN Climate Summit 2019 in New York, for which the Aktvistin sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was caught by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip turned into a GIF, an animated image that eventually became one of the most widely used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think about the US president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: To Stephen Colbert's relatively open question, she only answered briefly and dryly: "To be honest, I don't think that needs any further explanation."
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert had probably not expected the quick-witted answer and disappeared from the picture laughing briefly.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With her "How dare you?" Speech on the principles of climate protection, she was remembered by many at the climate conference.
morgenpost.de.276366.1: Ex-Dortmunder Immobile with three-pack for Lazio Rome
morgenpost.de.276366.2: Ciro Immobile is now on par with Bavaria's Robert Lewandowski in the race for Europe's Golden Shoe.
morgenpost.de.276366.3: The former Dortmunder Ciro Immobile still has the best chance of becoming the top scorer in the Italian football championship.
morgenpost.de.276366.4: The former BVB professional contributed three goals to the 5-1 (1-1) victory of Lazio Rome at Hellas Verona, including two converted penalties in the injury times of both halves.
morgenpost.de.276366.5: This means that the 30-year-old from fourth in the standings now has 34 goals on his account before the end of the season - just as many scored Robert Lewandowski from FC Bayern Munich in the past Bundesliga season.
morgenpost.de.276366.6: In Italy Cristiano Ronaldo follows with 30 goals so far, the Portuguese superstar met with the leader in the evening on Sampdoria Genoa.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green passed away
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a rollercoaster ride: After a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly up again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now blues rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Brilliant guitarist, drug junkie, cult fan: The co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members said in an official statement on Saturday that another statement would be announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians such as Peter Frampton praised Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: Mick Fleetwood spoke in an emotional reaction of a "monumental loss" for all past and present members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: Drummer Fleetwood and guitarist Green had founded the now legendary band in 1967 in London, and his dreamy instrumental hit "Albatross" is still unforgotten today.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician's life ("The End Of The Game", "In The Skies") resembled a roller coaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: With Fleetwood Mac Green experienced a rapid rise - the band celebrated their greatest successes but then without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: Among other things, there was a dispute because Green wanted to donate all the profits of the group to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to perform in wide robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Mental health problems also played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Three years after its formation, Green left the band in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.15: This was followed by a social decline.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, as biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time, Green was treated in psychiatry.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: During most of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have lived temporarily on the street, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent some time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a Jewish working-class family in Bethnal Green, London.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: At a young age, he became enthusiastic about American blues musicians such as B.B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: At the age of eleven, he learned to play the guitar.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager began playing guitar professionally and five years later got the chance to be on stage as lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: Shortly afterwards, he was hired as a replacement for his idol Eric Clapton with the Bluesbreakers.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the midst of the blues boom, Green formed Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 with his Bluesbreakers colleagues Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song "Albatross", composed by Green, gave the group their first number one hit in the winter of 1968 / 69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its downsides: Green could not cope with the media hype, his experiments with the drug LSD became more and more extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on life between music and addiction in an interview: "The worst thing that has happened to me in life is drugs - the best thing was to land a number one hit".
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green surprisingly achieved a respectable success in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Fleetwood Mac, meanwhile, swam without him in a new formation on a wave of success.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Their 1977 album "Rumours" sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite several minor solo successes, Green did not make a major comeback until 1996, when he rejoined a group of fellow musicians.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: The British "Daily Telegraph" spoke of a rock star who had returned to earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free of drugs, Green released several albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band disbanded in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime - and with his gentle sound one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
